note:
I'm a C++ dev building games that push Unreal Engine. I love adventure. When I'm not crafting my own RPG, find me playing tabletop games or dominating noobs online.

Epic tales aren't built overnight. But fuelled by enough coffee, we can create legends. I'm Ainiriand - here to share projects and start gaming! The future's unwritten. Let's play!
